item.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All ColoradoHappy #GivingTuesday! Sanctuary4All is an immigrant-led group dedicated to protecting families...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado

Happy #GivingTuesday! Sanctuary4All is an immigrant-led group dedicated to protecting families and improving the lives of Colorado immigrants of all backgrounds.... Founded in 2019 by longtime immigration activist Jeanette Vizguerra, Sanctuary4All works at the intersection of mutual aid and political action. By connecting directly impacted families with caring members of our community we will lift each other up and build a movement to affect positive systemic change for the masses. You can support our mission at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co committing to a monthly donation via Patreon at Patreon.com/Sanctuary4All or donating to sanctuary-4-all on Venmo. ðŸ’•âœ¨

See More
